comments: She is a great teacher. She helped me fully understand the subject. She offered extra credit at the end of every class which made us learn everything. You should definitely go with her.
Great teacher, explains things very clearly and always ready to help if things don\'t make sense. Reasonable amounts of homework, quizzes and tests are what you expect, nothing too difficult.

Valerie is by far the best math teacher I have ever had. She explains concepts in a clear and concise manner, she\'s friendly, fair, and makes herself very available for tutoring. I plan on taking her for the entire Calculus series.

She is the most awesome teacher.Very helpful and always available to help. Will put into you what you put into the class. Always has a kind word. Requires you to be attentive, and grades very fairly. Made Calc 2 fun!

I loved her class, and enjoyed it even though going in I thought it was going to be horrible. She is super nice and the best thing about her class is that she posts her notes online so if you miss class you can check her notes. Best professor to take the class with. Highly Recommended.

She may be a good Math teacher but she doesnt know statistics well enough to teach it. She doesnt teach or know how to use the calculator either. She\'s a grad student who doesnt have the time to be a good teacher. And she\'s not that hot.

Valerie provides fairly easy, but definitely unorthodox exams where she tests you on your comprehension of the concepts. She is extremely willing to help her students outside of class if necessary. I would not hesitate to take a class from her again.

Teaches concepts, not just rote calculation. Uses a variety of approaches to teach the material. Encourages collaboration. Extremely helpful outside of class. And she\'s only a Grad Student? She\'s a better prof than some profs! Her only flaw might be that people are expecting the same old style math class and experience cognitive dissonance.

...Hottest teacher I have had so far. Her tests are unorthodox as far as math tests go, grading more on conceptual comprehension than on being able to \'plug and chug\' the numbers. Homework is due every week.

Valerie is awesome! Very loose teaching style, but not sloppy in any way. She is really excited about teaching and is easily understood. I really like her because she is HUMAN, she accepts that people have lives outside the classroom and easily works with your schedule. She understands and accommodates students\' different learning needs.
